professional_summary: Results-driven software engineer with 14+ years of experience building scalable applications, optimizing performance, and leading cross-functional teams.

responsibilities: Tasked as the lead engineer for web accessibility audit & fix.
Developed micro front end web application using react, jest, RTL, Playwright, ELF, Component Library and various other useful libraries.
Led and mentored a cross-functional engineering team, overseeing task distribution, sprint execution, and technical governance.
Architected and developed scalable frontend and mobile application solutions aligned with business objectives.
Directed end-to-end project delivery, from requirement analysis to production deployment.
Designed and built independent in-house operational systems to optimize workflows and improve organizational efficiency.
Designed and optimized high-performance iOS applications, delivering seamless and intuitive user experiences.
Led end-to-end App Store releases for flagship applications including All Dox and Munch Ado.
Implemented rigorous testing and quality assurance practices to ensure code reliability, scalability, and maintainability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align product functionality with business and user requirements.
Delivered multiple production-grade iOS applications, including Handy Suggestions, Symphony Space Live, and MiPath.
Architected and developed scalable frontend and mobile application solutions aligned with business objectives.
Provided real-time technical support and issue resolution, minimizing downtime and improving operational productivity.
Collaborated with stakeholders to translate functional requirements into stable, user-centric mobile experiences.

projects.name: Transition Engine
projects.description: Modernized the frontend by migrating from Material UI to the Carbon Design System, engineered a Whisper-powered audio transcription pipeline, and implemented a robust user validation workflow with Alembic-driven database migrations. Orchestrated secure audio artifact management via IBM Cloud Storage, coordinated delivery through Monday, and deployed workloads on an OpenShift cluster. Leveraged PostgreSQL, Milvus vector indexing, and the Watson AI platform to ingest, store, and analyze multimodal project artifacts.

projects.name: Document Finder
projects.description: Engineered an AI-driven document retrieval system leveraging vector embeddings, delivering high-precision semantic and image-based search through scalable APIs, with Milvus as the high-performance vector database backbone.

projects.name: Consumer Travel Platform
projects.description: Strengthened application security and accessibility by remediating SAST findings and compliance gaps, implemented automated semantic versioning and CI/CD pipelines via GitHub Actions, optimized web performance through Server-Side Rendering, led design system migration (v6→v7), and established robust UI quality gates using Playwright and Jest screen testing.

projects.name: Persona API
projects.description: Led end-to-end DevSecOps transformation by migrating XLR pipelines to GitHub Actions, eliminating critical vulnerabilities (Client-Side Desync, SQL Injection, Web Cache Poisoning), and engineering a gated blue/green deployment model with multi-stage approvals and automated e1→e2 promotion. Established enterprise-grade CI/CD with Karate automation, JUnit/Jacoco coverage reporting, semantic-release package publishing, Slack-integrated deployment telemetry, secure secrets governance (GitHub Secrets + Vault via Helm), reusable artifact workflows with GitHub Pages hosting, and on-prem Hydra infrastructure orchestration.

projects.name: Select Homes + Retreats
projects.description: Engineered robust payment and trip summary modules, enhanced UX through targeted gap analysis and advanced search filters, improved Core Web Vitals (CLS) via skeleton loading, optimized performance with lazy loading and code splitting, modernized testing by migrating from Enzyme to React Testing Library, and implemented Reactlytics for advanced user analytics and behavioral tracking.

projects.name: Secret Consultation
projects.description: Architected a secure full-stack platform with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, delivering encrypted user identification for privacy-first anonymity, engineered scalable React-based front-end experiences, and implemented AWS-backed CI/CD pipelines to enable reliable, zero-downtime deployments.

projects.name: Front Office
projects.description: Led end-to-end delivery of an eight-month Front Office platform within a five-member cross-functional team, translating business requirements into scalable technical architecture. Built full-stack capabilities using Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, and SQL Server, deployed via IIS, and executed under a structured Waterfall SDLC with Jira-based governance. Delivered mission-critical modules including scheduling, appointment orchestration, patient queue management, check-in/out workflows, lab test booking, pharmacy order processing, and integrated video consultations.

publications.title: Medicinal Plant Identification by Leaf Structure Using Ensemble Methods on Deep Learning Algorithms
